title: I've been perma-banned. Help?
body:
Hello Rioters, and other members of the league community. My account has been permanently banned for the use of mods. Not once have I ever modded a game, let alone in a competitive multiplayer game, as I have too much respect for the community and the game as a whole. So riot please, I implore you to help me through this, as I have never hacked nor cheated in any game.

I would really appreciate if someone from Riot would help me by sending me the exact details of the occasion where I got the ban.

Thanks for reading.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry to hear you were banned, however we on the boards are unable to assist you as this is an account related issue.

You'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support to discuss the details of your ban and/or appeal your ban.
